title: Shades of Christmas Past
description: Bobbi Plechette is well aware of her boss's reputation for being a greedy misanthrope, but that hasn't prevented her from falling madly in love with Benjamin Skrooh. When he insists she work late on Christmas Eve, the last thing she expects is a seduction. Quick to give into his erotic demands, Bobbi is shocked at the pleasure she derives from submission.When Benjamin receives an unexpected visit from the spirit of a former lover, he is warned that three more shades will visit him that night. Bobbi receives a warning of her own; if she is present when the shades arrive, she will be forced to live Benjamin's life alongside him, inhabiting the bodies of his past, present, and future lovers.Recognizing a chance to prove her love, Bobbi is unwilling to allow Benjamin to face his ghosts alone. Together they embark on a journey to learn why Benjamin is the way he is, and perhaps discover a way to avert the dark future the shades have predicted for him.Warning: This book contains scenes of explicit sex and uses language of a very explicit nature. Reader discretion is strongly advised.This erotica novel is approximately 40,000 words in length.
author: Constance Daley
